text: Siwakorn Sangwong (, born February 6, 1997) is a Thai professional footballer who plays as a Defensive midfielder for Thai League 2 club BG Pathum United. ==Honours== ===Club=== ;BG Pathum United * Thai League 2 (1) : 2019 ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:1997 births Category:People from Pathum Thani Province Category:Thai footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:BG Pathum United F.C. players Category:Thai League 1 players Category:Thailand youth international footballers
title: Siwakorn Sangwong
